tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Toothluxe is one of the most professional dental clinics with the best up-to-date technology.

I had been to Dr. Neha Thaver for a tooth extraction and I haven't felt the pain at all since then.

At first I was scared that two of them needed to be extracted, but she patiently explained the problem and showed the X-ray details, which made me realize I really needed the to go for it. Since then life has been easier, thanks to her professional experience and ever smiling face that makes the process smoother.

Has a supportive staff especially for scheduling appointments.
Excellent experience. Dr. Neha was a thorough professional and did an excellent job with the teeth cleaning. Thank you so much.

Dr Neha is extremely friendly,  caring, approachable and empathetic towards the patients. She is very efficient in her work  and goes beyond the call of duty to ensure her patients  are safe and recovering well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am very satisfied with the dental treatment by Dr Neha Thaver. She also makes patients feel comfortable and at ease. Her clinic is very clean and hygienic. I would surely recommend her for dental care & treatment.
